siteDescription: Lalalend enables a lending protocol on Evmos

0.name: DEEP LIQUIDITY
0.paragraph: Receive MIA on each loan/position opened. Use your assets to borrow assets.

1.name: More Liquidity
1.paragraph: Asset vaults help source liquidity for on-demand borrowing positions

2.name: Worry Less
2.paragraph: Minimize Exposure to the market thanks to our smart order routing system and execute swaps at the best price on Evmos chain.

0.heading: Borrowing/Lending Efficiency
0.paragraph: Lend or borrow accross many assets without selling your assets.

1.heading: Deeper Liquidity
1.paragraph: Each single market has its own liquidity and reserves.

2.heading: Swaps Efficiency
2.paragraph: Minimize losses with our aggregate system and enjoy best swaps orders.

3.heading: Constant Yield
3.paragraph: Earn MIA as rewards constantly when providing liquidity to opened Vaults.

4.heading: Fully Collateralized
4.paragraph: All loans are over-collateralized, removing risk of bad debt.

5.heading: Synths with SEB
5.paragraph: Mint SEB stablecoin using your assets as collateral.

protocolUsage.uniswap: Lalalend prepares assets post expiry from Uniswap to roll-over for next expiry.
protocolUsage.uma: Synthetic assets like indices, stocks are minted with rDPX as collateral on UMA.
protocolUsage.chainlink: Chainlink oracles provide Dopex with pricing and volatility data.

tokenModel.paragraph: Lalalend utilizes two separate tokens to coordinate new ecosystem dynamics.

dpx.description: MIA is the limited supply governance token.
dpx.paragraph: It accrues fees and revenue from vaults and fees.

rdpx.description: SEB is the synthetic stablecoin token.
rdpx.paragraph: It can be used to stake in vaults and earn even more MIA rewards.
